'''A Leisurely Sip''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Conch Madeleine]] with [[Lynette]]. The [[recipe]] for Conch Madeleine is obtainable from [[Café Lutece]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

A Leisurely Sip increases all party members' Healing Bonus by '''25'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this can not target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
